Content: <font color='#ff780b'>Lunatic's Cannonball</font>

Fire a massive, super-heated cannonball, dealing [1] to targets, knocking them down, and leaving behind a trail of explosive fire clouds.
At the end of the trail, the cannonball explodes for [2] in a [3] radius, applying Necrofire to targets hit for 1 turn.
<font color='#ff780b'>Deadly Dud</font>

Launch a dud at a target position, dealing [1].
After 3 turns in combat (any source), the dud explodes for [2] in a [3] radius.
If the dud is destroyed before being fully armed, it deals [4] instead.
Elemental Bullets
Attune your firearm to the element of a target surface, gaining a <font color='#b54efe'>basic attack replacement skill</font> for 2 turns.

Fire your blunderbuss at a target for [1].

<font color='#11D77A'>Aimed Shot</font>

Take a focused shot on a target within [1], dealing [2] to [3], depending on distance to the target (20m max).
If the target is Marked, deal a critical hit.
<font color='#CCFF22'>Shoot Pistol</font>

Shoot your equipped pistol in a straight line at a target, dealing [1] + [2].
